word.name: abundant
/ə'bʌndənt/
word.explanEx: The computer analyst was glad to have chosen a field in which jobs were abundant

word.name: accomplishment
/ə'kɔmpliʃmənt/
word.explan: an impressive thing that is done or achieved after a lot of work
word.example: (n): thành tựu, thành tích; sự hoàn thành, sự làm xong
word.explanEx: The success of the company was based on its early accomplishments

word.name: bring together
N/A
word.example: (v): gom lại; nhóm lại, họp lại
word.explanEx: Our goal this year is to bring together the most creative group we can find

word.name: candidate
/'kændidit/
word.explan: a person who is trying to be elected or is applying for a job
word.example: (n): ứng cử viên, thí sinh, người dự thi, người dự tuyển
word.explanEx: The recruiter will interview all candidates for the position

word.name: come up with
N/A
word.example: (v): đưa ra, phát hiện, khám phá, ý định
word.explanEx: In order for that small business to succeed, it needs to come up with a new strategy

word.name: commensurate
/kə'menʃərit/
word.explan: matching something in size, importance, quality
word.explanEx: Generally the first year's salary is commensurate with experience and education level

word.name: match
/mætʃ/
word.example: (n): ‹cái› xứng nhau, hợp nhau; địch thủ, đối thủ, người ngang tài sức;
word.explanEx: It is difficult to make a decision when both candidates seem to be a perfect match

word.name: profile
/profile/
word.explan: a group of characteristics or traits
word.example: (n): tiểu sử sơ lược, bản tóm lược các đặc tính
word.explanEx: The recruiter told him that, unfortunately, he did not fit the job profile

word.name: qualification
/,kwɔlifi'keiʃn/
word.explan: a skill or type of experience that you need for a particular job or activity
word.example: (n): tư cách, khả năng, năng lực, trình độ (để làm cái gì);
word.explanEx: The applicant had so many qualifications that the company created a new position for her

word.name: recruit
/ri'kru:t/
word.explan: They recruited several new members to the club
word.example: (v, n): (v) tuyển dụng; (n) lính mới, nhân viên mới, thành viên mới
word.explanEx: The new recruits spent the entire day in training

word.name: submit
/səb'mit/
word.explanEx: Submit your résumé to the human resources department

word.name: time-consuming
/tʌɪm/ /kənˈsjuːmɪŋ/
word.explan: take up a lot of time
word.example: (adj): tốn nhiều thời gian, dài dòng
word.explanEx: Five interviews later, Ms. Lopez had the job, but it was the most time-consuming process she had ever gone through
